trans-unit.source: Now that you've learned the basics of blob storage, follow these links to learn about more complex storage tasks.
trans-unit.target: Now that you've learned the basics of blob storage, follow these links to learn about more complex storage tasks.

trans-unit.source: View the Blob service reference documentation in the [Storage Client Library for .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=390731) reference for complete details about available APIs.
trans-unit.target: View the Blob service reference documentation in the [Storage Client Library for .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=390731) reference for complete details about available APIs.

trans-unit.source: Learn about more advanced tasks you can perform with Azure Storage at [Storing and Accessing Data in Azure](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg433040.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Learn about more advanced tasks you can perform with Azure Storage at [Storing and Accessing Data in Azure](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/gg433040.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Learn how to simplify the code you write to work with Azure Storage by using the [Azure WebJobs SDK](../app-service/websites-dotnet-webjobs-sdk.md)
trans-unit.target: Learn how to simplify the code you write to work with Azure Storage by using the [Azure WebJobs SDK](../app-service/websites-dotnet-webjobs-sdk.md)

trans-unit.source: View more feature guides to learn about additional options for storing data in Azure.
trans-unit.target: View more feature guides to learn about additional options for storing data in Azure.
